00057 function new_fiche($p_cn,$p_type) {
00058   $ch_col="</TD><TD>";
00059   $ch_li='</TR><TR>';
00060   $r='<FORM action="fiche_new.php" method="post">';
00061   $r.='<INPUT TYPE="HIDDEN" name="fiche" value="'.$p_type.'">';

00063 
00064   $r.=JS_SHOW_TVA;
00065   $r.=JS_SEARCH_POSTE;

00067   echo '<H2 class="info">New </H2>';
00068   $p_f_id="";
00069   echo_debug('fiche_new.php',__LINE__,"Array is null");
00070   // Find all the attribute of the existing cards
00071   // --> Get_attr_def 
00072     $sql="select frd_id,ad_id,ad_text from  fiche_def join jnt_fic_attr using (fd_id)
00073            join attr_def using (ad_id) where fd_id=".$p_type." order by ad_id";
00074 
00075     $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,$sql);
00076     $Max=pg_NumRows($Res);
00077     // Put the card modele id (fiche_def.fd_id)
00078     $r.='<INPUT TYPE="HIDDEN" name="fd_id" value="'.$p_type.'">';
00079     for ($i=0;$i < $Max;$i++) {
00080       $l_line=pg_fetch_array($Res,$i);
00081 
00082       // The number of the attribute
00083       $Hid=sprintf('<INPUT TYPE="HIDDEN" name="ad_id%d" value="%s">',
00084                    $i,$l_line['ad_id']);
00085 
00086       $but_search_poste="";
00087       // Javascript for searching the account
00088       if ( $l_line ['ad_id'] == ATTR_DEF_ACCOUNT ) {
00089         $but_search_poste='<INPUT TYPE="BUTTON" VALUE="Cherche" OnClick="SearchPoste(\''.$l_sessid.'\',\'av_text'.$i.'\')">';
00090       } 
00091       // Javascript for showing the tva
00092       if ( $l_line ['ad_id'] == ATTR_DEF_TVA ) {
00093         $but_search_poste='<INPUT TYPE="BUTTON" VALUE="Montre" OnClick="ShowTva(\''.$l_sessid.'\',\'av_text'.$i.'\')">';
00094       }
00095       // content of the attribute
00096       $r.= sprintf('<TR><TD> %s </TD><TD><INPUT TYPE="TEXT" NAME="av_text%d">%s %s</TD></TR>',
00097               $l_line['ad_text'], $i,$Hid,$but_search_poste);
00098    }  
00099     $r.="</TABLE>";
00100     $r.='<INPUT TYPE="SUBMIT" name="add_fiche" value="Mis à jour">';
00101     $r.= '<INPUT TYPE="HIDDEN" name="inc" value="'.$Max.'">';
00102     $r.='</FORM>';
00103     return $r;
00104 }
